snippet: The three candidate cities (Istanbul, Madrid and Tokyo) for the 2020 Summer Games submitted their bid plans to the International Olympic Committee.
lead_paragraph: The three candidate cities (Istanbul, Madrid and Tokyo) for the 2020 Summer Games submitted their bid plans to the International Olympic Committee.

headline.seo: Cities Present Bids for 2020 Summer Games
headline.main: Cities Present Bids for 2020 Summer Games
